author: Jesse Pound
title: Economist Joseph Stiglitz says coronavirus is 'exposing' health inequality in US
description: Former World Bank chief economist Joseph Stiglitz said the pandemic has shown how poorly the United States pays and treats some of its workers.
content:
The coronavirus pandemic has highlighted the inequality in health care for different classes of American workers, former World Bank chief economist Joseph Stiglitz said Tuesday.
"The coronavirus is particularly nasty to people with pre-existing conditions ..… [+1874 chars]
